channel.title: Help with staff chat
channel.description:
Hey guys I made a new yell command called staff chat but the only problem is everyone can see it. I've changed the player right to 1 but this just means mod+ are the only ones who can type it. I need to know how I can change it so staff only can see it.
[317 Delta]
Thank you.

item.title: Help with staff chat
item.dc:creator: @m.dog311 m.dog311
item.description:
@m.dog311 wrote:

You’ll need to rewrite the yell method, giving it an argument for minimum rights and checking for that.

Read full topic

item.title: Help with staff chat
item.dc:creator: @Intimidation Intimidation
item.description:
@Intimidation wrote:

[code=lscript]if (command.startsWith(“schat”) && command.length() > 5 && playerRights >= 1) {
String titles = “”;
if (playerRights == 1) {
titles = “[SC]”;
}
if (playerRights == 2) {
titles = “[SC]”;
}
if (playerRights == 3) {
titles = “[SC]”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“YOURNAMEHERE”)) {
titles = “[OWNER&CODER]”;
}
if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase(“Testing”)) {
titles = “[CoS]”;
}
yell(titles + “” + playerName + ": "

  • command.substring(5));
    } [/code]

Read full topic
